Class TransactionData

java.lang.Object
plasystem_functions.TransactionData
public class TransactionData extends Object
Represents a transaction in the PlaSystem database, mapping to the Transactions table. Stores the transaction's ID, date components, total amount, payment amount, change amount, and associated items. Provides getters for accessing attributes and a method to format the date. Amounts are rounded to two decimal places where specified.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final double
    changeAmount
    The change returned, rounded to two decimal places (TRANS_CHANGE_AMOUNT, REAL NOT NULL, CHECK >= 0).
    private final double
    paymentAmount
    The payment amount provided (TRANS_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, REAL NOT NULL, CHECK >= TRANS_TOTAL_AMOUNT).
    private final double
    totalAmount
    The total amount of the transaction, rounded to two decimal places (TRANS_TOTAL_AMOUNT, REAL NOT NULL, CHECK >= 0).
    private final int
    transactionId
    The unique ID of the transaction (TRANS_ID, INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT).
    private final List<TransactionItemData>
    transactionItems
    The list of items in the transaction (linked to TransactionItems table).
    private final String
    transDateDay
    The day of the transaction date (TRANS_DATE_DAY, TEXT NOT NULL).
    private final String
    transDateMonth
    The month of the transaction date (TRANS_DATE_MONTH, TEXT NOT NULL).
    private final String
    transDateTime
    The time of the transaction (TRANS_DATE_TIME, TEXT NOT NULL).
    private final String
    transDateYear
    The year of the transaction date (TRANS_DATE_YEAR, TEXT NOT NULL).

  • Constructor Details

    • TransactionData

      public TransactionData(int transactionId, String transDateYear, String transDateMonth, String transDateDay, String transDateTime, double totalAmount, double paymentAmount, double changeAmount, List<TransactionItemData> transactionItems)
      Constructs a TransactionData object with the specified values, initializing all attributes. Rounds totalAmount and changeAmount to two decimal places using HALF_UP rounding.
      Parameters:
      transactionId - The unique ID of the transaction (auto-incremented by the database).
      transDateYear - The year of the transaction date. Should not be null to match database constraints.
      transDateMonth - The month of the transaction date. Should not be null to match database constraints.
      transDateDay - The day of the transaction date. Should not be null to match database constraints.
      transDateTime - The time of the transaction. Should not be null to match database constraints.
      totalAmount - The total amount of the transaction. Should be non-negative to match database constraints.
      paymentAmount - The payment amount provided. Should be at least totalAmount to match database constraints.
      changeAmount - The change returned. Should be non-negative to match database constraints.
      transactionItems - The list of transaction items. May be null or empty.
